extension.name: Remository
extension.author: ARTIO s.r.o.
extension.description: ARTIO JoomSEF extension for Remository component.

field.name: filename1
field.label: File name 1st part
field.description: First part of file name in the URL. Custom text may be set in the individual field.

field.name: filename2
field.label: File name 2nd part
field.description: Second part of file name in the URL. Custom text may be set in the individual field.

field.name: filename3
field.label: File name 3rd part
field.description: Third part of file name in the URL. Custom text may be set in the individual field.

field.name: filenametext
field.label: File custom text
field.description: The custom text part for the file name.

field.name: container_inc
field.label: Add container to URL
field.description: Controls the way containers are added to URL.

field.name: catname1
field.label: Container name 1st part
field.description: First part of container name in the URL. Custom text may be set in the individual field.

field.name: catname2
field.label: Container name 2nd part
field.description: Second part of container name in the URL. Custom text may be set in the individual field.

field.name: catname3
field.label: Container name 3rd part
field.description: Third part of container name in the URL. Custom text may be set in the individual field.

field.name: catnametext
field.label: Container custom text
field.description: The custom text part for the container name.

field.name: nonsef_id
field.label: Make ID non-SEF in Submit file links
field.description: If set to Yes, the id variable will be considered as non-SEF in Submit file links.

field.name: always_english
field.label: Always use English texts for links
field.description: If set to Yes, the links like Submit file, Search repository etc. will always be in English.
